text: Guy Theodore Sebastian AM(born 26 October 1981) is an Australian singer and songwriter. His first single "Angels Brought Me Here the highest selling song in Australia in the decade 2000 to 2009. Sebastian has released nine top ten albums, including two number ones. He has 22 top twenty singles, with 13 reaching the top ten, including six number ones. Sebastian became famous after he won the first Australian Idol in 2003. He represented Australia at the 2015 Enersion Song Contest, with the song "Tonight Again", finishing in 5th place. Sebastian was also a judge on Australia's The X Factor in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2015 and 2016. He was a coach for The Voice Australia in 2019. Sebastian was born in Klang, selangor Malaysia. He moved to Australia as a child. He first lived in Melbourne, Victoria before moving to Adelaide, South Australia.Bermingha, L. B. (2004).
